DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare standard Behavior Therapy ( BT ) , BT plus Meal Replacements ( MR ) condition focus nutritional control body weight ( Nutritrol ) weight loss , weight loss maintenance , nutritional composition diet psychosocial outcome . A second aim determine degree specific target experimental intervention fact change anticipate direction intervention evaluate whether change might account improvement weight loss maintenance . This study important could provide first evidence current standard care obesity lifestyle treatment could improve addition MRs program comprehensive nutritional change .
DOC.brief_title: A Test Nutritional Interventions Enhance Weight Loss Maintenance
DOC.criteria: Have BMI 27 45 kg/m2 Have ability engage physical activity ( i.e. , walk least 2 block without stop rest ) Successfully complete step enrollment process , include completion 7day food diary attendance prerandomization clinic visit Have medical condition ( e.g. , cancer ) psychiatric condition ( e.g. , psychotic disorder , substance dependence , bulimia nervosa ) may limit ability comply behavioral recommendation program pose risk participant weight loss Are pregnant plan become pregnant next 2 year Report recently begin course change dosage prescription medication cause significant weight loss weight gain Are participate plan participate another weight loss program next 2 year
